mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, userPwd, uName, nick, uEmail, jumin, tel, zipcode, address, locationName, joinTM) values( #{userid}, #{userPwd}, #{uName}, #{nick}, #{uEmail}, #{jumin}, #{tel} , #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{locationName}, now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where userid = #{userid}
select userid, userPwd from member where userid = #{userid} and userPwd = #{userPwd}
